revised_title: The Mechanism of the Mammalian Heart's Contraction and the Role of Electrical Waves
tldr: The author examines the sequence of movement and rhythm in the mammalian heart, focusing on the origin and propagation of the contraction wave. He discusses the development of electrical methods for studying heart movements and the role of electrical waves in the heart's contraction, highlighting the importance of understanding the mammalian heart's unique complexities.
